comments.subject: Average coffee
comments.body: The coffee was okay, but I've had better.

comments.subject: Cozy atmosphere
comments.body: Loved the ambiance, perfect for a Sunday morning.

comments.subject: Great service
comments.body: The staff was very friendly and attentive.

comments.subject: Quick service
comments.body: Got my order in less than 10 minutes.

comments.subject: Nice selection
comments.body: They have a good variety of vegan options.

comments.subject: Could be better
comments.body: The salad was a bit bland.

comments.subject: Tasty food
comments.body: Loved the sweet and sour chicken.

comments.subject: Okay service
comments.body: The service was a bit slow.

comments.subject: Good place to work
comments.body: Quiet and comfortable, great for working on my laptop.

comments.subject: Delicious cakes
comments.body: The chocolate cake is to die for!

comments.subject: Nice place
comments.body: Cute little bakery with friendly staff.
